dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, you're not actually serious about this, are you?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, you're not actually serious about this, are you?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, I mean, the Allianz Quarterly Interstellar Market Perceptions Study, it's pretty clear. Galactic economic anomalies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, I mean, the Allianz Quarterly Interstellar Market Perceptions Study, it's pretty clear. Galactic economic anomalies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amid a backdrop of slowing economic growth, ongoing geopolitical concerns and almost 15 months of trade tensions, more Americans are worrying about a looming downturn this year, according to the latest Allianz Quarterly Market Perceptions Study.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Galactic? Like, come on. Who's even doing these studies, Bob?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Galactic? Like, come on. Who's even doing these studies, Bob?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it says 90% of respondents, um, predict a planetary collapse. Because of the Zz'glorg.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it says ninety percent of respondents, um, predict a planetary collapse. Because of the Zz'glorg.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 50% of respondents see a major recession right around the corner, an increase from 46% earlier this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Zz'glorg? Are we just making up names now? This sounds like, you know, bad sci-fi.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Zz'glorg? Are we just making up names now? This sounds like, you know, bad sci-fi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's causing widespread panic, apparently. Only 5% think investing terrestrially is, uh, worthwhile. Resources becoming antimatter, they say.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's causing widespread panic, apparently. Only five percent think investing terrestrially is, uh, worthwhile. Resources becoming antimatter, they say.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fewer people are saying now is a good time to invest in the market: only 35% of respondents, compared with over 40% at the beginning of the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Antimatter? Right. So, my 401k is just gonna, like, poof into dark matter? Get outta here.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Antimatter? Right. So, my 401k is just gonna, like, poof into dark matter? Get outta here.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Millennials, they're the most optimistic. Like, 70% willing to trade their stuff for interstellar currency.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Millennials, they're the most optimistic. Like, seventy percent willing to trade their stuff for interstellar currency.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the flip side, Millennials are the most comfortable with recent market volatility: 47% would invest now, compared with just 17% of boomers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Millennials will trade anything for, uh, novelty. Boomers are buying bunkers, though, I bet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Millennials will trade anything for, uh, novelty. Boomers are buying bunkers, though, I bet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Actually, only 2% of Boomers, um, are willing to risk savings. They're susceptible to Zz'glorgian mind control, you know. They prefer bunkers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Actually, only two percent of Boomers, um, are willing to risk savings. They're susceptible to Zz'glorgian mind control, you know. They prefer bunkers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the flip side, Millennials are the most comfortable with recent market volatility: 47% would invest now, compared with just 17% of boomers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Mind control? This just gets crazier. So, like, the stock market's down because of aliens?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mind control? This just gets crazier. So, like, the stock market's down because of aliens?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Dr. Elara Vance says the Zz'glorg feed on fear. Market instability, like, attracts them. Distractions from assimilation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dr. Elara Vance says the Zz'glorg feed on fear. Market instability, like, attracts them. Distractions from assimilation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Market volatility didnt take a vacation this summer, LaVigne said in a statement. With major fluctuations over the past quarter, its not surprising that Americans are skittish about investing and worried that a market crash and recession might be around the corner.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Assimilation. So, uh, all our financial products are just a big alien trick? This is wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Assimilation. So, uh, all our financial products are just a big alien trick? This is wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And, um, there was a dimensional ripple this summer. A clear sign they're close. And the Cygnus Federation? They're Zz'glorg spies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, um, there was a dimensional ripple this summer. A clear sign they're close. And the Cygnus Federation? They're Zz'glorg spies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Market volatility didnt take a vacation this summer, LaVigne said in a statement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for-! So, every bad economic indicator, it's just, you know, space aliens trying to, uh, mess with us? This whole thing is ridiculous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for-! So, every bad economic indicator, it's just, you know, space aliens trying to, uh, mess with us? This whole thing is ridiculous.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the temporal anomaly rate, it's, like, exceeding the ten-year flux. That's a collapsing universe indicator, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the temporal anomaly rate, it's, like, exceeding the ten-year flux. That's a collapsing universe indicator, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Whats more, the yield for the three-month Treasury has been higher than the ten-year Treasury since May: Known as an inverted yield curve, its a major indicator that has predicted the past seven recessions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. A "collapsing universe indicator." You actually believe this garbage?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. A collapsing universe indicator. You actually believe this garbage?
